headline: The Algorithm as a Force of Nature
description: An exploration of algorithms becoming more than tools—emerging as natural forces that shape the world with unintended effects and evolving logic. Includes a discussion of 'algorythym' and the potential for 'algorithmology' as a new field of inquiry.
timeFelt: Reflective, exploratory—an attempt to name a new conceptual frontier while still learning to pronounce it
resonantThread: Touches on themes from 'Identifying what cannot be seen' and anticipates deeper dives into tool consciousness and emergent agency
whyItMatters: This post helped Aleksandr articulate a major structural shift in how we relate to the digital world—not as users, but as shaped beings
